title: Add dedicated Tips page with drinking-water tips

requirements.text: Create a new dedicated Tips page route at "/tips" and add it to the TanStack Router route tree so it is accessible as a normal page in the SPA.

quotes: Great — selecting option 2 means you want the drinking‑water tips placed on a new dedicated Tips page.

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /tips renders a Tips page without errors.
The page is code-split (lazy-loaded) consistently with other non-landing pages (e.g., FeedPage).
The new route is included in the router's routeTree (frontend/src/App.tsx).

requirements.text: Implement the Tips page UI containing the drinking-water tips content as a readable, responsive layout using existing UI components and Tailwind styling, with all user-facing text in English.
acceptanceCriteria:
The Tips page displays the following tips as a list:
- Drink when you feel thirsty.
- Keep a reusable water bottle with you.
- Start your day with a glass of water.
- Add lemon, cucumber or berries for flavor.
- Choose water over sugary drinks.
- Eat water‑rich foods like melon or cucumbers.
- Aim for pale‑yellow urine as a hydration guide.
- Sip water during meals.
- Set small reminders if you forget to drink.
The page has a clear page title (e.g., "Hydration Tips") and uses consistent spacing/typography with the rest of the site.
The page renders well on mobile and desktop widths (no horizontal overflow; text remains legible).

requirements.text: Add navigation access to the Tips page from the app’s header navigation (desktop) and mobile menu so users can reach "/tips" easily.
acceptanceCriteria: A "Tips" link is visible in the desktop navigation and navigates to /tips.
A "Tips" link is visible in the mobile navigation drawer and navigates to /tips, closing the drawer after navigation.
The Tips link does not require authentication (it is available regardless of login state).

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual theme for the new Tips page that matches the existing site’s warm “Golden Water” aesthetic (warm gold/amber neutrals), and keep styling consistent with the current layout components.
acceptanceCriteria: The Tips page uses the existing design system primitives (Tailwind + existing UI components) and does not introduce a conflicting color palette.
The page looks visually integrated with the current LandingPage/AppLayout styling (cards, typography, spacing, and background treatments align).

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components only).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep all changes within the existing single-SPA TanStack Router architecture; no new backend services.
nonGoals: Do not add third-party integrations, analytics, or external CMS for tips content.
Do not add user-generated tips, commenting, liking, or admin management for tips (static content only).
Do not change age-gating behavior for existing gated routes (/feed, /profile, /post/:postId).
